department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: High pressure air compressor system contract.
description: Natural Resources Canada has a requirement for one (1) high pressure air compressor system.
full_summary:
Tender Notice
=====================================================

### High Pressure Air Compressor System

**Tender Reference Information**

* **Reference Number**: WS3615356269-Doc3615431577
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3615356269
* **Publication Date**: August 19, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 28, 2022, 2:00 p.m. EDT

**Description of Requirements**

Natural Resources Canada requires one (1) High Pressure Air Compressor System.

**Contract Information**

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity**: National Research Council of Canada (NRC)
* **End User Entity Address**: 100 Sussex Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R6, Canada

**Tender Process**

This tender is issued in accordance with the Canada-Canada Agreement and acknowledges the terms and conditions of the Agreement. Bidders wishing to submit an offer must provide a fully-completed [Proposal Form ID] template that includes the required information outlined in the proposal guidelines.

**Selection Criteria**

Offers will be evaluated based on **Price**.

**Tender Status**

The tender process has been **Cancelled**. 

**Acceptable Languages**

French and English are acceptable languages of communication.

**Trade Agreements**

Designated goods and services that have been included in this tender may be eligible for goods or services provided under the following Trade Agreements:

*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
*   North American Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, etc.

### Contact Information

Way, Stephanie (SPAC/PSPC)

*   **Contact Email**: stephanie-way@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
